function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate communication strategy in the tourism industry regarding COVID-19 risks","Impact":"Increased transmission of the virus within the tourism sector","Mitigation":"Developing step-by-step guidelines for key tourism sectors to reduce virus transmission","Technologies":"Communication platforms, digital media","People":"Travelers, tourism industry workers, local communities","Owner":"Tourism industry associations, health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of information for international travelers on reducing COVID-19 risks","Impact":"Perceived high risks for international travelers, leading to potential travel cancellations","Mitigation":"Making health-related guidelines for travelers available during vacation planning phase","Technologies":"Online platforms, mobile applications","People":"International travelers, tourism industry","Owner":"Tourism organizations, health authorities"},{"Description":"Negative economic impacts due to general anxiety affecting vacation length","Impact":"Decreased length of vacations, leading to reduced revenue for the tourism industry","Mitigation":"Conducting research to understand the causes of general anxiety and develop appropriate solutions","Technologies":"Survey tools, data analytics, psychological research methods","People":"Tourists, tourism providers, economic policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, tourism industry associations, government agencies"}]}
